document_data.name: Noreia
document_data.mainbody: '''Noreia''' was an [[erinyes]] in the service of [[Glasya]].
document_data.Activities: Noreia was the ninth of the [[Pradixikai]], Glasya's elite erinyes guard and the fury leader of her twin sisters, [[Faventia]] and [[Fidentia]].
document_data.History:
In [[1486 DR]], Noreia was on patrol with Faventia and Fidentia when they met [[Lorcan]]. They tried to bully him but Lorcan silenced them.

Later, she was with [[Sulci]] and [[Nisibis]] when she informed Lorcan that [[Sairché]] had gone with [[Adolican Rhand]].
document_data.Relationship: Noreia was the daughter of the erinyes [[Invadiah]] and the human wizard [[Ilcanorr]] of [[Luthcheq]].
